description.zh-cn: 宋朝宗室，宋太宗长子，宋真宗同母兄。因叔父赵廷美之死而精神失常，后被废为庶人，宋真宗即位后恢复爵位。
description.en: A member of the imperial clan of the Song dynasty, the eldest son of Emperor Taizong, and the full elder brother of Emperor Zhenzong. He suffered a mental breakdown after the death of his uncle Zhao Tingmei, was subsequently demoted to a commoner, and had his noble rank restored after Emperor Zhenzong ascended the throne.

description.zh-cn: 宋朝第二位皇帝，赵元佐与宋真宗之父。
description.en: The second emperor of the Song dynasty, father of Zhao Yuanzuo and Emperor Zhenzong.

description.zh-cn: 宋朝第三位皇帝，宋太宗第三子，赵元佐同母弟。
description.en: The third emperor of the Song dynasty, the third son of Emperor Taizong, and the full younger brother of Zhao Yuanzuo.

description.zh-cn: 宋太宗的皇后，赵元佐与宋真宗之母。
description.en: Empress of Emperor Taizong, mother of Zhao Yuanzuo and Emperor Zhenzong.

description.zh-cn: 宋太宗之弟，封秦王。其死导致赵元佐精神失常。
description.en: Younger brother of Emperor Taizong, created the Prince of Qin. His death led to Zhao Yuanzuo's mental breakdown.

description.zh-cn: 赵元佐的妻子，中书令冯继业的幼女。
description.en: Wife of Zhao Yuanzuo, youngest daughter of the Secretariat Director Feng Jiye.

description.zh-cn: 赵元佐的继室。
description.en: Second wife of Zhao Yuanzuo.

description.zh-cn: 赵元佐之子。
description.en: Son of Zhao Yuanzuo.

description.zh-cn: 赵元佐之子。
description.en: Son of Zhao Yuanzuo.

description.zh-cn: 赵元佐之子。
description.en: Son of Zhao Yuanzuo.

description.zh-cn: 南宋名臣，赵元佐的七世孙。
description.en: A famous minister of the Southern Song dynasty and the seventh-generation descendant of Zhao Yuanzuo.

description.zh-cn: 宋朝第八位皇帝，追封赵元佐为汉王。
description.en: The eighth emperor of the Song dynasty, who posthumously re-ennobled Zhao Yuanzuo as the Prince of Han.

description.zh-cn: 指没有官爵的平民，是中国古代一种社会身份等级。
description.en: Refers to a commoner without official rank or title, a social status in ancient China.

description.zh-cn: 赵元佐是宋太宗的长子。
description.en: Zhao Yuanzuo was the eldest son of Emperor Taizong.

description.zh-cn: 赵元佐是元德皇后的儿子。
description.en: Zhao Yuanzuo was the son of Empress Yuande.

description.zh-cn: 赵元佐是宋真宗的同母兄。
description.en: Zhao Yuanzuo was the full elder brother of Emperor Zhenzong.

description.zh-cn: 太平兴国七年（982年），在秦王赵廷美被贬后，赵元佐是唯一为其申救的人。
description.en: In 982 (7th year of the Taiping Xingguo era), after the Prince of Qin, Zhao Tingmei, was demoted, Zhao Yuanzuo was the only one who tried to save him.

description.zh-cn: 赵廷美死后，赵元佐精神失常（发疯）。
description.en: After Zhao Tingmei's death, Zhao Yuanzuo suffered a mental breakdown (went mad).

description.zh-cn: 雍熙二年（985年），因赵元佐酒后纵火焚烧宫廷，宋太宗下诏将其废为庶人。
description.en: In 985 (2nd year of the Yongxi era), after Zhao Yuanzuo drunkenly set fire to the palace, Emperor Taizong issued an edict demoting him to a commoner.

description.zh-cn: 雍熙二年（985年），赵元佐被废为庶人。
description.en: In 985 (2nd year of the Yongxi era), Zhao Yuanzuo was demoted to the status of a commoner.

description.zh-cn: 宋真宗即位后，恢复了赵元佐的爵位。
description.en: After Emperor Zhenzong ascended the throne, he restored Zhao Yuanzuo's noble rank.

description.zh-cn: 冯氏为赵元佐的元配夫人。
description.en: Lady Feng was the first wife of Zhao Yuanzuo.

description.zh-cn: 王氏为赵元佐的继室夫人。
description.en: Lady Wang was the second wife of Zhao Yuanzuo.

description.zh-cn: 赵允升是赵元佐的儿子。
description.en: Zhao Yunsheng was the son of Zhao Yuanzuo.

description.zh-cn: 赵允言是赵元佐的儿子。
description.en: Zhao Yunyan was the son of Zhao Yuanzuo.

description.zh-cn: 赵允成是赵元佐的儿子。
description.en: Zhao Yuncheng was the son of Zhao Yuanzuo.

description.zh-cn: 赵汝愚是赵元佐的七世孙。
description.en: Zhao Ruyu was the seventh-generation descendant of Zhao Yuanzuo.

description.zh-cn: 宋徽宗时期，追改封赵元佐为汉王。
description.en: During the reign of Emperor Huizong, Zhao Yuanzuo was posthumously re-ennobled as the Prince of Han.
